clusterList.phrase: to address soaring costs this legislation will address the transparency and the accountability of the tuition pricing system shining a bright light on the prices set by colleges and universities
it seems the only thing consistent about college costs is that they are going up and going up rapidly
holds schools accountable for driving up prices
it exhausts the people in our schools to adjust to new superintendents

with a son in college and a daughter on her way i am no stranger to the impact that the cost of textbooks can have on the family budget the cost of college has significantly increased during recent years and one of the reasons for this trend is the often uncalculated cost of course textbooks
it amounts to a public shaming of colleges that haven't reined in their cost increases
no that money has been set aside for the school district and is there for them to use
so-called tax cap is nothing but a gimmick its one-size-fits-all approach for school funding takes away local control my taxes will still go up and deep cuts to school programs will hurt our kids
fund for the improvement of postsecondary education
school districts across oakland county are adjusting their budgets and enacting cost-saving measures to cope with rising fuel prices
the fruitport community schools have bucked the trend of district financial troubles due largely to the number of schools of choice students it receives each year

on the revenue side the gazette found increases in the state's per-pupil allocations have been undercut by enrollment declines on the expense side districts have faced sharp cost increases most notably in the mandatory contribution to the school employees retirement fund
it is common that in economic downturns library use increases
